name: Festive Frenzy!
description:
A peculiar clown insists on giving you a special tour around the carnival. Careful not to die of excitement!

Warning: this game contains flashing lights, loud noises, glitch effects, body horror and gore. This game is intended for mature audiences only.

(Please enjoy my first game and let me know what you think! Festive Frenzy was made in the span of ~2 months.)

If you'd like to find out more about my characters, check out my social media and patreon for more content!

Credits for all audio used in the game goes to:
  • The Majority of Creampie's sounds are credited to Owly-Bee; her gasp is credited to bymondfisch89 and the "woman's evil laughter" to MadamVicious
  • "Eerie Forest" background music by gregswinford; Dark ambient music by xanco123; Melancholic piano music by shortrecord; and the Horror Theme loop by mrthenoronha; Horror background music by migfus20. All users' content has been found on FreeSound.org
  • “Phantom Mansion,” "A Sinister Courtyard," and "Children of Shadows" music is from PlayOnLoop.com, Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0
